title: Add Comet and Opik to README.md
body:
Add Comet and Opik to Applications in README.md

Signed-off-by: Abby Morgan abigailm@comet.com

title: Added ilum data lakehehouse
body:
I'm adding ilum, which is a platform consolidating many tools existing on this list.

Here is the link to the platform - https://ilum.cloud/

I've also added an interesting blog article showing how to start with spark on k8s - https://ilum.cloud/blog/spark-on-kubernetes/
